scenario: In 2025, Grace has an Adjusted Gross Income (AGI) of $171,387.86. Grace makes a charitable contribution of $137,793.17 in cash to a public charity. Under I.R.C. § 170(b)(1)(G)(i)(I), the deduction is limited to 60% of the contribution base.
question: Calculate the allowable charitable deduction for 2025.
answer_explanation: The deduction is limited to 60% of AGI ($102,832.72). Allowable: $102,832.72.
reasoning: Calculated limit and compared to contribution.
